name: Kaiju Khaos (itch)
description:
Protect the city from the monsters! 

Place towers by dragging and dropping, then click on them to upgrade their stats!

Towers must be leveled up to increase stats further

Defeat every colour of Kaiju to win!

WARNING: The Windows version is an older one that is more difficult

(This game was made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 81: Kaiju, with the restriction "Death isn't the end")

Font used: https://www.dafont.com/vcr-osd-mono.font

Liberty Bell MIDI from: http://www.pcdon.com/midipatriotic.html
